front.title: Supporting Multi-Sender SA in a Secure and Efficient Way

abstract.t: Astract: In this draft, we propose two efficient and practical mechanisms to enable the anti-replay service in the multiple sender SA. As IPSec is still under its development, this draft is mainly based on the existing RFCs. The two solutions require only minor change to the current standards and are back compatible. The security of new proposals and the impacts of possible future standards will be analyzed and discussed.
